bug.description: In 01_training_introduction.ipynb I see from fastai.vision import * which is probably convenient for advanced users, but makes it difficult for newcomers to understand where unfamiliar functions/classes originate. Prefer to see import vision from fastai or from fastai.vision import (x, y, z) Relevant style guide: <denchmark-link:https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008/#imports>https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008/#imports</denchmark-link>
